metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1735 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in the Ansible Engine when the fetch module is used. An attacker could intercept the module, inject a new path, and then choose a new destination path on the controller node. All versions in 2.7.x, 2.8.x and 2.9.x branches are believed to be vulnerable.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-1735` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 2.9.7+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.7+dfsg-1').
